content: Maxfield MellenbruchTwelve Roses, 2023Acrylic paints/stencils on primed and gessoed aluminum, stainless steel housingTwelve Roses represents twelve unique wallets; one for each of the twelve sections of Satoshi Nakamoto's white paper.Available in this auction is Rose: 8. See https://kialara.com/product/guardians/ to learn more about this storage format and to see how it works. Thanks, everyone! Auction Terms:Starting Bid: Â 0.001 btcBid Increments: Â 0.001 btc (or multiples of). Bid Format: Â 0.001 btcAuction end time *if there is no bid in the final 5 minutes:Auction Ends: Monday, November 13th 2023, 10AM Pacific (California)Countdown: https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/generic?iso=20231113T10&p0=770&msg=Kialara+Rose+8+%2B+Guardians+Suite&font=cursiveThe auctions will end at the time stated above unless there is a bid placed in the final 5 minutes of the auction. If a bid is placed within the final 5 minutes of the auction, the new auction end time will be 5 minutes after the last bid. (i.e. if a bid is placed at 12:57pm, the new auction end time is 1:02pm) The auction end time will then extend 5 minutes ad infinitum until no new, valid bid has been placed for 5 minutes.I may exclude bidders, or require a deposit for any bidders at my discretion. If you are a new account but a previous customer of mine, please PM prior to bidding to introduce yourself.Shipping & Insurance: Free insured shipping to USA, $45 international (express) w/ buyer responsible for insurance if desired.Direct payments only to this address or contact for private address: Â bc1qrgzjnr9au8htdlgtacfd2pg2hfgc06nz4de0ryBTC payment due in full within 24 hours of auction end, or item will be re-listed/offered to next-highest bidder.I will not contact you outside of this forum, be safe.
